experience_analysis.alignment: Om's experience as a Web development Team Head and Tech Team Member demonstrates project leadership and collaboration skills, which are valuable for a Software Engineer role. His involvement in Google Developer Groups and ACM Student Chapter shows an interest in technology and community engagement.
gaps: Lack of formal Software Engineering internship experience.
Limited experience with backend technologies and databases as demonstrated by Gaurish's experience.
No significant open-source contributions or personal projects showcasing full software development lifecycle experience.
suggestions: Pursue internships at software companies to gain practical experience.
Contribute to open-source projects to improve coding skills and collaboration abilities.
Develop personal projects that showcase full-stack development skills, including backend and database integration.

education_comparison.analysis: Both profiles share a similar educational background, with both pursuing a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering from KJ Somaiya College of Engineering. Both also attended KJ Somaiya affiliated Junior Colleges. Gaurish's profile includes his grade and GPA out of 10. Om includes his percentile for the MHT-CET exam. However, Gaurish has completed more internships and has real job experience at reputable companies.
recommendations: Focus on excelling in relevant coursework, such as data structures and algorithms, database management, and software engineering principles.

Consider pursuing certifications in specific technologies or methodologies relevant to software engineering, such as AWS Certified Developer or Certified Scrum Master. However, practical experience should be prioritized over certifications at this stage.

steps: Prioritize gaining practical experience through internships or personal projects that simulate real-world software development scenarios.
Focus on mastering core software engineering principles, such as data structures, algorithms, and design patterns.
Actively participate in coding communities and contribute to open-source projects to build a professional network and improve coding skills.
Tailor LinkedIn profile to highlight relevant skills and experiences for Software Engineer roles, quantifying accomplishments whenever possible.
Network with software engineers and recruiters to learn about industry trends and job opportunities.
recommended_projects: Build a full-stack web application with user authentication, database integration, and API endpoints.
Develop a mobile app with a backend API using React Native or Flutter and Firebase.
Contribute to an open-source project on GitHub, focusing on bug fixes or new feature development.

strengths: Strong foundation in web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Three.js).
Active participation in tech communities (Google Developer Groups, ACM Student Chapter) demonstrates passion and initiative.
Good academic performance (9.71 GPA) indicates a strong aptitude for learning.
